pages.text: The $(l)Vault Recycler$() is a recyling bench for Vault Armor, Tools and Idols. Unidentified items can also be recycled.

Vault Trinkets are recycled for $(l)Trinket Scrap$() that can be used to create new Trinkets in the $(l)Vault Forge$(). $(br2)Recycling Vault Gear will reward pieces of $(l)Vault Scrap$() are rewarded together with a chance for any $(l)Focus$() and an additional chance for a $(l)Painite Gem.$()$(br2)If the Trinket or Vault Gear has been used, it will result in less rewards when recycled.
